meanings.definition: To seek favor by flattering or fawning over someone.
meanings.sent1: She brownnosed her boss to get a promotion.
meanings.sent2: He always brownnosed the teacher to get better grades.
meanings.sent3: The student brownnosed the principal to get out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The politician brownnosed the voters to win their support.
meanings.sent5: The employee brownnosed the manager to get a raise.

meanings.definition: A person who seeks favor by flattering or fawning over someone.
meanings.sent1: The brownnosed was always seeking approval from the boss.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the office brownnosed for always flattering the supervisor.
meanings.sent3: The brownnosed made sure to compliment everyone in the office.
meanings.sent4: He was the ultimate brownnosed, always trying to please everyone.
meanings.sent5: The brownnosed was eager to please and gain favor with everyone.
